ygData.subject: Camping times
ygData.msgSnippet: As many of you have said, some of the camping times for the Quests these days are rediculous, dozens of hours just sitting by the computer, but what about
ygData.messageBody:
As many of you have said, some of the camping times for the Quests
these days are rediculous, dozens of hours just sitting by the
computer, but what about those of us who have to PAY for it. I mean
over here we pay for the price of a local phone call, every minute
we're online. You guys have a flat rate fee a lot of you don't you?
well I have to pay A LOT of money to just play EQ, let alone camp
stuff. My phone bil is about $250 a month and it's not cool, so
camping for these itmes is something pretty much impossible for me,
when are Verant going to realise this and change quests so they can
be completed in a lot of very small bits?

And also when are they going to have some GM's deal with people who
play from Europe lie me? I mean I hate to log on at 3 in the mourning
just to petition a GM for a name chnge which he never showed up for!
They should be bothered to employ just a COUPLE in Europe to help us
with our problems.
